title: Vegetable Biryani
description: Aromatic rice layered with spiced vegetables
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (carrots, beans, peas, potatoes)
Whole spices (bay leaves, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves)
instructions: Wash and soak rice for 30 minutes.
Heat ghee, add whole spices and half the onions. Fry until golden.
Add ginger-garlic paste, tomatoes, and cook until soft.
Add vegetables, yogurt, spices, and salt. Cook for 10 minutes.
In another pot, boil water with salt and whole spices.
Add rice and cook until 70% done. Drain.
Layer half the rice over vegetables, sprinkle herbs and saffron milk.
Add remaining rice, more herbs, and fried onions.
Cover and cook on low heat for 20 minutes.
Let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.
notes: The key to perfect biryani is layering and dum (slow cooking). Don't skip the resting time after cooking.
